page.title: 17BUCKNALL PARK AND CHURCH
page.content: The park at Bucknall was opened in l953 and in 1973 Finney Gardens was added. It is popular with families because the adults can play bowls,tennis,football and cricket and there is a playground and many animals for the children to see like ducks,birds,goats and pigs. Bucknall park makes a weekend in Bucknall more exciting.I(Charlotte Heath)think that all the money that has gone into the park is worth the enjoyment that it gives.St Mary's Church Bucknall dates from 1856,but there has been a church on this site since the sixteenth century.Major repair work from 1981-4 has saved it from closure and the Manpower Services Commission have undertaken the clearing of the vandalised churchyard.An average of one hundred and twenty people attend Sunday Services.Local people are pleased the church has been restored.
